title: Order vs Chaos Question
body:
The event ends today and I am 10 order tokens off of being able to craft the order icon with the border. Is there any way to get some extra tokens?

Edit: For example I have 100 RP that I don't know how to use. Is it possible to be able to cash in like 10 RP for 10 order tokens?

replies.body:
There's a certain bundle in the Store tab right now that gets you a hextech chest & key + 10 order tokens that costs 125 RP. If you wanted I might be able to make a quick trade of 25 RP for some kind of drawing of a poro, or you could hang onto this RP Art exchange for another time. 

Hit me back up and let me know, or shoot me some fine poro art and I'll see what I can do ^_^!
Shoot, that offer isn't available anymore. Thanks for the help anyways though.
